backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining product catalog, order management, user profiles, Stripe checkout sessions, and admin functions with role-based access control for a multi-platform e-commerce aggregator.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of gold and silver hexagonal background patterns on HomePage and AdminDashboard with high confidence test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, contexts, and configuration with warm earth tone design system and multi-platform shopping functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes with warm earth tones and sidebar theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering TanStack RouterProvider with configured application routes.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section component with three feature cards (Creative Excellence, Goal-Oriented, Passionate Work) and portfolio description using warm design system.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Protected route wrapper that checks authentication and admin privileges, displaying appropriate error states or rendering children for authorized admins.
frontend/src/components/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart UI displaying cart items with quantity controls, remove functionality, total calculation, and checkout button with empty state.
frontend/src/components/CartButton.tsx: Header cart button with item count badge that opens a slide-out sheet containing the full Cart component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying company info, quick navigation links (with smooth scrolling), social media buttons, and copyright information. Includes email contact and order tracking navigation.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed header with navigation, mobile menu toggle, cart button, login button, and conditional admin/orders links. Handles smooth scrolling to page sections and responsive design.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, main heading, call-to-action buttons for browsing products and learning more, plus animated scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper component that renders Header, page content via Outlet, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that toggles between login/logout states using Internet Identity, with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/MarkupSettings.t: Admin component for viewing and updating the global price markup percentage applied to all products, with form validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/NoEmailBanner.ts: Dismissible alert banner warning users that email notifications are unavailable and suggesting they bookmark order IDs for tracking. Uses localStorage for persistence.
frontend/src/components/OrderDetailsModa: Modal dialog displaying full order details including customer info, order items with pricing, stock verification panel, return policy, status update controls, and fulfillment notes.
frontend/src/components/OrderTimeline.ts: Visual timeline component showing order status progression through stages (pending, processing, shipped, delivered) with icons and progress indicators, or cancelled state.
frontend/src/components/Payment.tsx: Payment component that displays customer shipping info and initiates Stripe checkout by creating a session with cart items and redirect URLs.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSetup.tsx: Admin-only component that displays a configuration form for setting up Stripe secret key and allowed countries when Stripe is not yet configured.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a single product with image, platform logo, price, description, and buttons to add to cart or view on the original platform.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Main products section that displays either all products or search results in a responsive grid, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ProductSearch.ts: Search interface with text input and platform filter dropdown that triggers product search on button click or Enter key.
frontend/src/components/ReturnPolicyDisp: Displays platform-specific return policy information with return period and link to official policy page for Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, or BlinkIt.
frontend/src/components/StockVerificatio: Admin panel for manually verifying stock availability of products in an order with radio buttons for available/check-official/unavailable status and links to brand websites.
frontend/src/contexts/CartContext.tsx: React context providing cart state management with localStorage persistence, including add/remove/update/clear operations and total/count calculations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateCheckoutSess: React Query mutation hook that creates a Stripe checkout session by calling the backend actor with shopping items and redirect URLs, returning the session ID and URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including product management (get, search, add), order management (create, get, update status), admin checks, and Stripe configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm earth-tone color palette for light/dark modes, custom fonts (Playfair Display and Inter), and hexagonal background pattern utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page displaying order statistics (total orders, revenue) and quick actions, with markup settings component, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrders.tsx: Admin order management page showing a table of all orders with details, status badges, and order detail modal, including revenue statistics and protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page component that collects customer information via a form, displays cart items and total, and integrates with Payment and PaymentSetup components to process orders.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page component that renders Hero, Products, and About sections with a hexagonal pattern background.
frontend/src/pages/OrderTracking.tsx: Order tracking page that displays user's order history with status badges, timelines, and return policy information; requires Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Payment failure page that displays an error message with troubleshooting tips and navigation options to retry checkout or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Payment success page that creates an order from cart items after successful Stripe payment, displays order ID, and provides navigation to order tracking or home.
frontend/src/router.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining all application routes including home, checkout, payment success/failure, order tracking, and admin pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and sessionStorage values, supporting both regular and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette using OKLCH, extended theme settings for typography, animations, and design tokens for a warm, earthy aesthetic.
project_state.json: Project state tracking for a two-page website with product search and management features. Includes gold/silver hexagonal background pattern on both pages, with product data containing name, photo, and price fields.
